metadata.title: CVE-2019-5763 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Failure to check error conditions in V8 in Google Chrome prior to72.0.3626.81 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
